main_definition: Having a resemblance or likeness; alike in nature, form, or quality.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Resembling each other to some extent; having certain characteristics in common.
meanings_and_examples.example: The two sisters have similar facial features.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Alike or aloof in temperament, character, or behavior.
meanings_and_examples.example: They are very similar in their approach to problem-solving.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to or having the same qualities; sharing common attributes or features.
meanings_and_examples.example: The two models of cars have a similar design and performance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having a degree of likeness in terms of size, shape, or quantity.
meanings_and_examples.example: These two diamonds are very similar in clarity and cut.
